title: shazde
author: shazde
created_time: November 07, 2023, 01:59:06 PMLast edit: May 16, 2024, 12:55:47 PM by shazde
content: Poker.democrat is a domain name that is suitable for poker and gambling websites. It is a unique and catchy name that combines the words "poker" and "democrat". It suggests a place where people can play poker and other gambling games in a democratic and fair way. It also implies a sense of community, freedom, and fun.24hrs Offer for 10,000 euro on On Sedo.com.Poker.Republican is Live Now for Auction On FlippaSome of the benefits of this domain name are:- It has a .democrat extension, which is a new and trendy domain extension that appeals to a large and diverse audience.- It is easy to spell and pronounce, which makes it more attractive to potential customers.- It is short and simple, which makes it easier to remember and type.- It is relevant and descriptive, which helps to attract more traffic and increase conversions.- It is unique and distinctive, which helps to stand out from the competition and build a strong brand identity.If you are looking for a domain name that is perfect for your poker and gambling website, poker.democrat is the one for you. Don't miss this opportunity to own this amazing domain name and start your online business today.If you have any questions or comments about this domain name or the auction, please feel free to reply to this topic or contact me directly.I am open to reasonable offers and negotiations, so don't hesitate to make an offer if you like this domain name.I have verified the ownership and the availability of this domain name on Sedo, so you can bid with confidence and security.Domain : poker.republican is availableDomain : Official WebsiteSale on Dan : See moreAuction on Sedo : See more

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: You have made a good pitch to sell your domain but I doubt very much that if I wanted to launch a poker casino I would want that domain. It's the first time I've heard of the domain 'democrat' and as much as you base the game on smart contracts I don't know what relevance the word democratic has in a game that is based on wanting to fleece the other guy (I'm not saying it's undemocratic or anything, but the word is irrelevant).I don't see what 'democratic' difference there is between playing poker there and playing on a fiat site like Pokerstars or a crypto site like Stake.com (which by the way has a much better domain).I wish you good luck anyway.

comments.author: shazde
comments.body: Quote from: Don Pedro Dinero on November 07, 2023, 02:11:19 PMYou have made a good pitch to sell your domain but I doubt very much that if I wanted to launch a poker casino I would want that domain. It's the first time I've heard of the domain 'democrat' and as much as you base the game on smart contracts I don't know what relevance the word democratic has in a game that is based on wanting to fleece the other guy (I'm not saying it's undemocratic or anything, but the word is irrelevant).I don't see what 'democratic' difference there is between playing poker there and playing on a fiat site like Pokerstars or a crypto site like Stake.com (which by the way has a much better domain).I wish you good luck anyway.Thank you for your feedback. I appreciate your opinion and respect your point of view. However, I would like to explain why I think poker.democrat is a domain name that is suitable for poker and gambling websites.First of all, the .democrat extension is a new and trendy domain extension that appeals to a large and diverse audience. According to Namecheap, .democrat domains are ideal for anyone who wants to express their democratic values, beliefs, or opinions online. They are also great for political campaigns, organizations, movements, or causes that support democracy. Therefore, poker.democrat is a domain name that can attract more visitors and customers who are interested in poker and gambling, as well as in democracy and its principles.Secondly, the word "democrat" in poker.democrat is not irrelevant or meaningless. It suggests a place where people can play poker and other gambling games in a democratic and fair way. It implies a sense of community, freedom, and fun. It also differentiates the website from other poker and gambling websites that may be perceived as unfair, rigged, or fraudulent. Poker.democrat is a domain name that can build trust and loyalty among the users and create a positive reputation for the website.Thirdly, poker.democrat is a unique and catchy domain name that combines the words "poker" and "democrat". It is easy to spell and pronounce, which makes it more attractive to potential customers. It is short and simple, which makes it easier to remember and type. It is relevant and descriptive, which helps to attract more traffic and increase conversions. It is also unique and distinctive, which helps to stand out from the competition and build a strong brand identity.In conclusion, poker.democrat is a domain name that is perfect for poker and gambling websites. It has many benefits and advantages that make it a valuable and profitable domain name. It is not just a random combination of words, but a meaningful and appealing name that can create a successful and popular online platform for poker and gambling enthusiasts.I hope this clarifies why I think poker.democrat is a domain name that is suitable for poker and gambling websites. Thank you for your time and attention.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: shazde on November 07, 2023, 02:16:55 PM-snipUnderstand your explanation.However, people are mostly regular is who always think (.com) is safest. We as the user not really care about the domain at all, and what we care is the brand value since most website or people are visiting (.com). Also, do people are not play fair if they play with other domain ? I don't really think so.They're gonna to feel safe. I just check the old site, it's just 1 month+.

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on November 07, 2023, 04:15:45 PMQuote from: shazde on November 07, 2023, 02:16:55 PM-snipUnderstand your explanation.However, people are mostly regular is who always think (.com) is safest. We as the user not really care about the domain at all, and what we care is the brand value since most website or people are visiting (.com). Also, do people are not play fair if they play with other domain ? I don't really think so.They're gonna to feel safe. I just check the old site, it's just 1 month+.Well, I do not attach much importance on domain name extensions and I am sure many people do not also attach such importance to it. There is no doubt that the .com extension is the most popular but this doesn't mean it's the safest. Someone can purchase a very nice .com domain and will later pull the rug. The idea of domain extensions and domain names is for branding and easy memorization as it has nothing to do with reputation.Whether Op chooses .democratic or .undemocratic, it doesn't matter so much only if they find a way to prove to the community that they are reputable.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: It may be a crazy idea which just came to my mind, but keeping on the table that people will start the get very political next year (because the presidencial elections in the United States), having this domain to target poker players who also happen to be registered or have intentions to vote for the Democrat party.  It would not be the first time I see a brand taking leverage on such important political event to increase their sales in the market. Though, it would be a gimmick which could be only pulled off once every 4 years or twice if we take in consideration the midterm elections.   Anyways, OP. Wish you luck with the selling of your domain, it has potential, but it would also require quite a big advertisement investment.

comments.author: xtopten
comments.body: Quote from: Hispo on November 07, 2023, 04:48:55 PMIt may be a crazy idea which just came to my mind, but keeping on the table that people will start the get very political next year (because the presidencial elections in the United States), having this domain to target poker players who also happen to be registered or have intentions to vote for the Democrat party.  It would not be the first time I see a brand taking leverage on such important political event to increase their sales in the market. Though, it would be a gimmick which could be only pulled off once every 4 years or twice if we take in consideration the midterm elections.   Anyways, OP. Wish you luck with the selling of your domain, it has potential, but it would also require quite a big advertisement investment. I agree that using the domain name poker.democrat to attract poker players who support the Democratic Party is a creative idea. It can be a way to stand out from the crowd and appeal to a certain range of customers. Smile However, I also think this can be a risky move, as it might alienate or offend some potential customers who have different views or political preferences. It can also cause controversy or unwanted criticism from the media or the public.Good luck!

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: xtopten on November 11, 2023, 08:19:11 AMQuote from: Hispo on November 07, 2023, 04:48:55 PMIt may be a crazy idea which just came to my mind, but keeping on the table that people will start the get very political next year (because the presidencial elections in the United States), having this domain to target poker players who also happen to be registered or have intentions to vote for the Democrat party.  It would not be the first time I see a brand taking leverage on such important political event to increase their sales in the market. Though, it would be a gimmick which could be only pulled off once every 4 years or twice if we take in consideration the midterm elections.   Anyways, OP. Wish you luck with the selling of your domain, it has potential, but it would also require quite a big advertisement investment. I agree that using the domain name poker.democrat to attract poker players who support the Democratic Party is a creative idea. It can be a way to stand out from the crowd and appeal to a certain range of customers. Smile However, I also think this can be a risky move, as it might alienate or offend some potential customers who have different views or political preferences. It can also cause controversy or unwanted criticism from the media or the public.Good luck!I don't see why anyone would feel offended by it, to be honest. I have seen more blatant political advertisement for the sake of boosting attractiveness of products and services. Besides, I would dare to say that in Las Vegas there are both Democrat and Republican gamblers. In general, those Republicans who complain about things which we may consider to be ridiculous have more to do with gender theory, taxes, gun control. If you pay attention to it, No republican campaign has actively targeted gambling and there must be a good reason for it, don't you think? If OP was able to also acquire poker(dot)republican, then he could appeal to the 100% of the political spectrum in USA (who are gamblers)
